00029 #ifndef SC_FIFO_IFS_H
00030 #define SC_FIFO_IFS_H
00031 
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/communication/sc_interface.h"
00034 
00035 namespace sc_core {
00036 
00037 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_nonblocking_in_if<T>
00039 //
00040 //  The sc_fifo<T> input nonblocking interface class.
00041 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 
00043 template <class T> 
00044 class sc_fifo_nonblocking_in_if 
00045 : virtual public sc_interface 
00046 { 
00047 public: 
00048 
00049     // non-blocking read 
00050     virtual bool nb_read( T& ) = 0; 
00051 
00052     // get the data written event 
00053     virtual const sc_event& data_written_event() const = 0; 
00054 }; 
00055 
00056 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_blocking_in_if<T>
00058 //
00059 //  The sc_fifo<T> input blocking interface class.
00060 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 
00062 template <class T> 
00063 class sc_fifo_blocking_in_if 
00064 : virtual public sc_interface 
00065 { 
00066 public: 
00067 
00068     // blocking read 
00069     virtual void read( T& ) = 0; 
00070     virtual T read() = 0; 
00071 }; 
00072 
00073 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_in_if<T>
00075 //
00076 //  The sc_fifo<T> input interface class.
00077 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 
00079 template <class T> 
00080 class sc_fifo_in_if 
00081 : public sc_fifo_nonblocking_in_if<T>, 
00082   public sc_fifo_blocking_in_if<T> 
00083 { 
00084 public: 
00085 
00086     // get the number of available samples 
00087     virtual int num_available() const = 0; 
00088 
00089 protected: 
00090 
00091     // constructor 
00092 
00093     sc_fifo_in_if() 
00094         {} 
00095 
00096 private: 
00097 
00098     // disabled 
00099     sc_fifo_in_if( const sc_fifo_in_if<T>& ); 
00100     sc_fifo_in_if<T>& operator = ( const sc_fifo_in_if<T>& ); 
00101 }; 
00102 
00103 
00104 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_nonblocking_out_if<T>
00106 //
00107 //  The sc_fifo<T> nonblocking output interface class.
00108 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 
00110 template <class T> 
00111 class sc_fifo_nonblocking_out_if 
00112 : virtual public sc_interface 
00113 { 
00114 public: 
00115 
00116     // non-blocking write 
00117     virtual bool nb_write( const T& ) = 0; 
00118 
00119     // get the data read event 
00120     virtual const sc_event& data_read_event() const = 0; 
00121 }; 
00122 
00123 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_blocking_out_if<T>
00125 //
00126 //  The sc_fifo<T> blocking output interface class.
00127 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 
00129 template <class T> 
00130 class sc_fifo_blocking_out_if 
00131 : virtual public sc_interface 
00132 { 
00133 public: 
00134 
00135     // blocking write 
00136     virtual void write( const T& ) = 0; 
00137 
00138 }; 
00139 
00140 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_out_if<T>
00142 //
00143 //  The sc_fifo<T> output interface class.
00144 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 
00146 template <class T> 
00147 class sc_fifo_out_if 
00148 : public sc_fifo_nonblocking_out_if<T>, 
00149   public sc_fifo_blocking_out_if<T> 
00150 { 
00151 public: 
00152 
00153     // get the number of free spaces 
00154     virtual int num_free() const = 0; 
00155 
00156 protected: 
00157 
00158     // constructor 
00159 
00160     sc_fifo_out_if() 
00161         {} 
00162 
00163 private: 
00164 
00165     // disabled 
00166     sc_fifo_out_if( const sc_fifo_out_if<T>& ); 
00167     sc_fifo_out_if<T>& operator = ( const sc_fifo_out_if<T>& ); 
00168 };
